function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper communication leading to risk perception among the public and affecting societal response to the pandemic.","Impact":"Misinformation and rumors can lead to incorrect public response and behavior, hindering control of the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Government and companies should ensure accurate and timely communication to eliminate rumors and false information.","Technologies":"AI, ML, media and social media monitoring tools for identifying and correcting false information.","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of surveillance technologies leading to unmonitored spread of the infection.","Impact":"Lack of effective monitoring can result in uncontrolled spread of the infection and difficulties in tracking infected individuals.","Mitigation":"Proper implementation of surveillance technologies for monitoring and tracking infected individuals.","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies, AI, ML for data analysis and tracking.","People":"General public, government","Owner":"Government, technology companies"},{"Description":"Inefficient use of supply chain technologies leading to shortages of essential healthcare products.","Impact":"Shortages of essential products like ventilators, masks, and hand-sanitizers can hinder the healthcare system's ability to respond to the pandemic effectively.","Mitigation":"Optimizing supply chain technologies to ensure efficient production and distribution of essential healthcare products.","Technologies":"Supply-chain management systems, AI for demand forecasting, automation for production and distribution.","People":"Healthcare system, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"}]}
